document_data.name: The Lockup
document_data.mainbody: '''The Lockup''' was a prison owned by the Crown of Cormyr and the [[Purple Dragons]] of [[Suzail]] in the Forest Kingdom of [[Cormyr]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|64}}
document_data.Location: The Lockup stood just outside the [[Citadel of the Purple Dragons]]'s gate in the southeastern part of Suzail. It was located on the street that stretched from [[The Market Hall (Suzail)|the Market Hall]] on the [[Coachwheels Way]] and the city's [[The Market Yard (Suzail)|Market Yard]].
document_data.Description: The prison was a notably unfriendly, almost square stone building that loomed over the street. Its edifice was decorated with carved statues of Purple Dragon Knights. The Lockup was usually used to keep suspects and criminals as they waited for a trial as well as convicted wrongdoers.{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|73}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: *Some said that Purple Dragon Knight statues could be animated by the Lockup's warden with a single command in case of riots and unrest.
